meanings.definition: Occurring before the official opening of something.
meanings.sent1: The preopening ceremony was a quiet affair, with only a few select guests in attendance.
meanings.sent2: The preopening tasks were completed smoothly to ensure everything was ready for the big day.
meanings.sent3: The preopening decorations were so secretive that even the curious cat couldn't sneak a peek.
meanings.sent4: The preopening anticipation hung in the air like a thick fog, signaling the excitement to come.
meanings.sent5: The preopening preparations felt like a hidden treasure hunt, each step revealing a new surprise.

meanings.definition: The period of time before a business or event officially opens to the public.
meanings.sent1: During the preopening phase, the staff worked tirelessly to ensure everything was perfect for the grand opening.
meanings.sent2: The preopening of the store attracted a lot of curious onlookers eager to see what was inside.
meanings.sent3: The preopening buzz around town made everyone curious about what surprises the new business would bring.
meanings.sent4: The preopening period felt like a calm before the storm, with excitement building up each day.
meanings.sent5: The preopening countdown clock on the wall reminded everyone of the approaching big day.
